TopicTitle: Drain Fuel Evenly for Rockets too?

Articles.Content:
Hey all!

I see that the new jets manage to drain fuel evenly from their stage, a very nice move on Squad's part.

Is there any way to extend this behavior to the non jets as well? The behavior of draining tanks top to bottom has driven me insane since, well, since I noticed it. It really can muck with ones CoG on launch. (Barring that, is there any way you know to get them to drain bottom to top? I know, realism and all, but... just imagine creative piping, lets say? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) )

Thanks in advance!
Doesn't respect decouplers. So it'll drain all your fuel

Urg. That's unfortunate. I recall the Goodspeed Pumps addon, I may see if it still works. I remember setting it up to pump fuel around in priority levels.

Thanks Nathen!
